browser-action.name: read
browser-action.description:
Read the text content of an Element.
Possible parameters are: - selector (required): The selector is a string that point to the elements in the page. Several types of selector are supported: text, CSS, XPath... You can specify several selectors by adding multiple selector parameters to this action. The targeted element will match any of the selectors (OR operator). - variableName (optional): The variable name of the text result. - attribute (optional): If specified, returns the attribute's value instead of the text value of the selected element - timeout (optional): Forces the timeout for that action in ms. By default the OpenBrowser defaultTimeout is used. Maximum value is 200000. - frameIndex (optional): Frame index. - frameName (optional): Frame name. - frameSelector (optional): Frame selector. - ignoreErrors (optional): Set this option to true to ignore errors for this action. This is useful for handling conditional actions without having to resort to a "If...Then...Else" or a "Try...Catch" block. Default value is "true".
